title: Ticket #2613: Add versioning to libcondor_utils
description:
Now that the Condor utilities are stored in a shared library, there's the potential for a Condor binary to find the wrong version of the utilities library at run time, causing unexpected behavior. We should add some kind of versioning to prevent this from happening.

I'm assuming that trying to track compatibility between different versions of Condor is infeasible. This is a private API that we change at will. We are happy to restrict a binary to work only with a libcondor_utils from the same release.

There several options:

  • Set the soname and increment on every release.
  • Use symbol versioning for everything in libcondor_utils, with the version set to the Condor version.
  • Include the Condor version in the filename (e.g. libcondor_utils-7.7.5.so).
